TopicTitle: Roc SSTO Project - to the moons of Kerbin, or a one way trip to Duna!

Articles.Content:
Here's the photo album.

This SSTO can land on the Mun, Minmus or, provided you docked it to a large fuel tank, anywhere with similar gravity or less (you must flip over onto the wheels at the last minute, as landing on the engines is not advised, as shown in the photo album).

The SSTO carries 8 standard jet fuel tanks, 4 turbojets, 40 Ram intakes, 4 FL-T800 rocket tanks and 2 NERVAs. Oh, and 3 crew members.

Roc MKX Download link.

Edited June 13, 2013 by TheFod
